# Theme weeks

Theme weeks occupy a whole week with a single topic, with 10-20 events scheduled on the topic. This year, we'll run theme weeks as follows:

+ w/c 31st March - [Power Automate](kind_power_automate_week.qmd)
+ w/c 19th May 2025 - [Power Query](kind_power_query_week.qmd)
+ w/c 30th June 2025 - [Troubleshooting](kind_troubleshooting_week.qmd)
+ w/c 25th August 2025 - No Stupid Questions
+ w/c 27th October 2025 - [Open Source / copyleft](kind_opensource.qmd)
